name: GROW Model
description: The GROW Model is a foundational coaching framework used to structure coaching conversations. It supports clients in setting clear goals, understanding reality, exploring options, and defining the way forward.

goal_achievement.title: What do you want to achieve?

success_definition.title: What will success look like?
success_definition.description: Describe how you'll know when you've achieved it

current_position.title: Where are you now in relation to the goal?

obstacles.title: What obstacles are in your way?

possible_ways_forward.title: What are the possible ways forward?

resources_strategies.title: What resources or strategies could you use?
resources_strategies.description: Identify available resources and potential strategies

actions_to_take.title: What actions will you take?
actions_to_take.description: Define specific actions you will take

accountability.title: How will you stay accountable?
accountability.description: Define how you will track progress and stay accountable
